rows.label: tlk46310171_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Ah, you must be the travelers
Zeke-dono was escorting.
Welcome to the cathedral of Acedia.

rows.label: tlk46310171_01_msg0002
rows.name:
Oh, I see there is a salvager
among your number!

rows.label: tlk46310171_01_msg0003
rows.name:
Pope Marveni himself used to
salvage artifacts from all across Alst
in his younger days, you know.
